briefTitle: Compassionate Use of Nitazoxanide for the Treatment of Clostridium Difficile Infection
officialTitle: Compassionate Use of Nitazoxanide for the Treatment of Clostridium Difficile Colitis in Patients Who Have Failed Conventional Therapy
summary: The purpose of this study is for compassionate use of nitazoxanide in the treatment of diarrheal disease due to Clostridium difficile infection when the patient has failed previous treatment with metronidazole or vancomycin.
